build.desc:
Trigger a build with optional parameters
	nestor build <jobname> ["param1=value1&param2=value2"]

options.desc: Display console ouptput of the triggered build progress

console.desc:
Display latest build console output
	nestor console <jobname>

stop.desc:
Stop the currently running build
	nestor stop <jobname>

dashboard.desc:
View status of all jobs
	nestor dashboard

discover.desc:
Discover Jenkins instance running on a specified host
	nestor discover <host>

executor.desc:
View executors' status (running builds)
	nestor executor

job.desc:
View job status reports
	nestor job <jobname>

ver.desc:
View Jenkins version number
	nestor ver

irc.desc:
Start an IRC bot
	nestor irc <host> <channel> [nick]
